meanings.definition: The act of inserting or being inserted.
meanings.sent1: Her insertions into the conversation were always thoughtful.
meanings.sent2: The insertions in the document were clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: His constant insertions of jokes kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The insertions of color in the painting brought it to life.
meanings.sent5: The insertions of new characters made the story more exciting.

meanings.definition: Something inserted or to be inserted.
meanings.sent1: She found unexpected insertions in her bag after the trip.
meanings.sent2: The insertions in the puzzle completed the picture perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The strange insertions in the recipe confused the chef.
meanings.sent4: His words were like insertions of wisdom in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The insertions of notes in the music sheet made it more challenging.

meanings.definition: The addition of new material in a text.
meanings.sent1: The insertions in the essay enhanced its overall quality.
meanings.sent2: The professor's insertions in the textbook clarified the concepts.
meanings.sent3: The insertions of emojis in the email made it more fun to read.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like insertions of creativity in the project.
meanings.sent5: The insertions of historical facts enriched the story.
